title: Cosmic Canvas.
content:
Welcome to Cosmic Canvas! Our website is dedicated to bringing you the most stunning abstract images of deep space objects, such as black holes and pulsars. Our wallpapers feature swirling colors and patterns that will transport you to the far reaches of the universe. 

Whether you're looking to add some cosmic flair to your desktop background or just want to marvel at the beauty of the cosmos, our collection of high-quality wallpapers has something for everyone. So why wait? Explore the wonders of the universe with Cosmic Canvas today! ðŸš€ðŸŒŒ

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"An abstract image of a deep space object, such as a black hole or pulsar, with swirling colors and patterns."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
